Ola Uduku bụ onye British African architect bụ onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ na Manchester School of Architecture
Uduku bụ onye otu Nigerian Institute of Architects na Royal Institute of British Architects
Ọ bụ ọkachamara n'ihe owuwu agụmakwụkwọ nke Afrịka.
Ọ gara Federal Government Girls 'College, Owerri
Ọ gụrụ ihe owuwu na Mahadum nke Naịjirịa, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ iji nweta nzere masta na imepụta ụlọ anyanwụ na Tropics
Ọ kwagara United Kingdom maka agụmakwụkwọ dị ogo elu

Uduku nwetara nzere doctoral ya na Mahadum Cambridge, ebe ọ nyochara ihe ndị metụtara atụmatụ ụlọ akwụkwọ na Naịjirịa. Mgbe ọ nwetasịrị nzere doctorate ya, Uduku mechara ule ruru eru ya na Royal Institute of British Architects
A họpụtara ya na ngalaba nke Edinburgh College of Art
Afọ ole na ole ka e mesịrị, Uduku sonyeere Mahadum Strathclyde, ebe ọ nwetara Master of Business Administration
Uduku jere ozi dị ka Prọfesọ na Architecture na Dean maka Africa na Mahadum Edinburgh
Nnyocha ya na-atụle ụlọ agụmakwụkwọ na Afrịka.

N'afọ 2001, Uduku ghọrọ onye guzobere ArchiAfrika, otu na-achọghị uru nke na-achọ imeziwanye akụkọ ihe mere eme nke oge a na Afrịka. O mepụtara ihe ngosi na Manchester School of Art nke nyochara ebe nchekwa Alan Vaughan-Richards.
N'afọ 2017, a họpụtara Uduku dịka Prọfesọ nke Architecture na Manchester School of Architecture

N'ebe a, ọ na-eduzi mmemme nyocha maka ndi gụsịrị akwụkwọ na obodo, ihe nketa na nchekwa. Ọ tọrọ ntọala EdenAppLabs, otu ndị na-eme nnyocha na-eleba anya n'iji ngwa mkpanaka maka imepụta gburugburu ebe obibi.
